DOC.brief_summary: Saxagliptin new investigational medication develop treatment type 2 diabetes . This study design test efficacy daily saxagliptin renally impaired patient .
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Effect Saxagliptin Compared With Placebo Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Renal Impairment
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed type 2 diabetes Documented history CrCl < 50 ml/min within 3 month prior enrollment HbA1c ≥7.0 % ≤11.0 % Type 1 diabetes , history diabetic ketoacidosis hyposmolar nonketonic coma Previous current treatment DPPIV inhibitor and/or GLP1 mimetic .
